content: round height gauge isn t important because you can just add on rounds more yardage will be needed to make a longer hat hook sizes were recently changed/updated - please get gauge fantasiedinephtys 1 has translated this pattern to italian 2 she has also created a cowl to match the hat pattern is here 3 but it s in italian only 1 http //www ravelry com/people/fantasiedinephtys 2 http //lefantasiedinephtys altervista org/cappello-scaldacollo-div 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/divine-cowl-to-match-with-rheatheylias-divine-hat
